lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll poke it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a spell attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Did Pike help me out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add a ten to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So plus ten to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. So that would be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 6d8. Gimme.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the gnome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's 4d8. 5d8. 6d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percival. Unless you want to move, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I moved to Pike to pour stuff in her. That's all. I did not mean that in any weird way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival. Your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to, for my bonus action, I'm going to down a greater, which is 4d4, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d4 plus four, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you add four to your 26 when you healed her? Or did you just roll--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm technically engaged with this bloody thing, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm just going to-- There's little I can do other than just say, please, somebody fix this, and I'm going to take two shots at the red dragon. First shot with Bad News. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an additional 4d6 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I electrified, sitting on his head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically speaking, no, the way that this works-- it's like a Tesla arc, so it wouldn't technically-- you'll feel tingly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Start shaking in the leather armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop it! Stop it! I can't count when-- that's (counting) 21 points of damage. Stop saying that, it's 21! You don't know, it's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're like everything I hate about Overwatch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the fingered claws of Thordak gets blasted off from the impact from Bad News, the energy arcing through the rest of his arm from Cabal's Ruin. The second shot, however, having to aim, manages to just barely miss Vax. He gets in the way of the shot, and you have to shoot wide and it misses entirely. Is that your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Percy's turn, Thordak's going to go ahead and use his third legendary action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To do what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To do a tail attack against Vax. That is a 22 to hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Nope. Nope. Hasted, 23, fuck you. Not you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23? Jesus! Where'd you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that brings us to-- we're going to say this will be... all right. The ground shakes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit, I forgot about that. Lair actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty much everybody--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Jarett in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Except for you, who's in the air. Need to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, rerolling that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20, 25.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rerolling, because that was awful. Oh, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if he doesn't like it, he gets to reroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fighter ability.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight for Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, Keyleth, Percy, Pike, Gilmore, all get knocked prone from the ground quaking as you all fall on your back. You manage to brace yourself against the wall real fast, Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Jarett get knocked to his feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No. He just gets shaken on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Popcorn on a trampoline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan does not get her breath back. She is, however, going to utilize Chain Lightning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to see how this works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to hit us. No, she decides where it hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's still on our side, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For another round or two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Chain Lightning. Dexterity saving throw. That's a success for Thordak. Sorry, I'm trying to get through this. Okay, so that is halved. Halved, that is 18 points of lightning damage. Vax, make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. Yeah. Good time to use Luck. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, okay. You suffer 18 points of lightning damage as the bolt of energy that strikes Thordak then arcs into you because you're right next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would this be a new round for me to use Evasion? I've lost track.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 'cause Thordak's already gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've already used it. So yeah. That ends that. Going to take off and land right there next to that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is that guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the lizardman that fell from the wyvern. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dragon just landed on him, basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's got a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Is Thordak within 30 feet of fire giant dude?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That answers my question, then. I'm going to reach up and do Blight on Thordak, 'cause I think I can, this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Blight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Thordak is 50 feet in the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit fuck balls. Okay. Then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can jump and then cast it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could climb up and cast it, if you wanted to try that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I'm in a skirt situation. It's not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not even paying attention, so if that's your concern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's just clumsy. Okay, I'm going to do-- everything's not ideal right now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Climb it, climb it, Keyleth! Just do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fucking end of the world!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't know! I'm not good at that. I'm bad at that thing. So I'm not a dextrous person, so instead I'm going to use my Spire of Conflux.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that Vestige thing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I haven't forgotten about it, all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are you talking to right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My ancestors. And I'm going to do Chain Lightning on Thordak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Another chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Thordak's save is 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thordak's going to use his second legendary resistance to make it. So go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fine, that's fine. It's how many damage? Like 8d10?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Want some d10s?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's three more. How many are you at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need one more. Oh, and I get to reroll ones, right? That's actually really--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa! Holy fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's a seven. So that's 29, 34, plus-- that's a seven. And then 34 plus 14 is 48.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So half that is 24 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's no one else within 30 feet of him, other than Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan's not even in that range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one else? Well. Okay. I do that, and then I turn around and I'm going to cast a Grasping Vine as a bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right next to me. And then I'm going to use it to whip around and grab Percy and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have visual range on Percy right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't used any movement. Can I shift into that house a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you move into the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. And once again cast Grasping Vine from out of that corner and drag Percy to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Around the ankles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still prone, but better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi. That was really good. Ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn? All right. Jarett's turn. Jarett gets up. Jarett still only has a view of the dragon and is like, "What happened to-- that's weird." Missed the whole exchange. But gets the gist of it. Disadvantage. Misses. Natural 20, disadvantage. 15, still hits. Not a critical, unfortunately. But a ten on damage, that's 13 piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't drop fear when he died?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I think that would instill more fear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Logistically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know if it was a reset when you wake up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Gilmore gets up from the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so distracted right now. There's too much happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's going to cast another 4th-level Lightning Bolt. Thordak fails his save. Is going to use his last resistance to get that, 'cause he's doing real rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got big-level spells, don't you, still?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's rolling shit tonight. 14 points of lightning damage. No, 16. Okay. All righty. That's Gilmore's turn. It's Grog and Thordak's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yes? I would like to stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high is Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thordak is 40 feet up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch on a stick. Could I just attach the bloodaxe and throw it at his much smaller foot, now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I can only jump 20 feet in the air. 15 feet in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That'll do it, won't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's 40 feet in the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know numbers. Maybe it'll work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These hieroglyphs seem to indicate that he's too high. Yeah, 'cause I'm only like 14 feet high, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm reckless throwing the bushwhacker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) He got another natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage. Roll again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really pretty die that he's got, too. Sparkly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's getting ideas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 34, 37, 38. 38 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That with your bonus? I just said that randomly, I don't actually know any of your bonuses, I just thought maybe it would jog something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my movement, can I run nuts towards where the fire giant is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You can get right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll work. I need a new plaything that'll actually stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thordak, who is physically falling apart at this point, sections just sloughing off, and just the whole experience has been sending his physical-- his whole physical form is wrecked right now. The word escapes me that I was looking for. He's going to go ahead and turn and go into a full flight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm riding him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're riding him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Shit yeah, I'm riding him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no. No, Vax, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dash into the dark hole within.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is this good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A dark hole?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax, be careful!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't care about the tunnel, huh? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need to go ahead and roll a strength saving throw to try and maintain grip as the dragon goes into a full dive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my last Luck. So it's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. You do manage to make it inside the tunnel, but you lose your grip and then go into a full tumble, hitting the ground. It's a decline, it's a 45-degree angle downward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm in there with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Roll an acrobatics check to stop yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So you do tumble and come to a stop. You don't take any damage from the fall, and you stop yourself from doing a tumble, but it is still a decline into darkness below, and you just watch as the back end of Thordak's barely flying form slams into the side of the tunnel and continues swooping away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I still see him with darkvision at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just begins to leave outside of your darkvision.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we still in the same chain of initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As of right now, we are, yes. So. Finishing, that is Thordak's go. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I run after him and dive after him, because I saw that. And at the edge of my movement, I want to hop out on my broom and get ready to fly down the hole after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're both down there in the darkness by yourselves. You guys watch as the rest of them dive into the hole. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away from me is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far does your darkvision go for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's outside of your darkvision.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I am going to use my movement and go 120 feet, or until I see him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast-- 'cause I didn't do an attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is happening after your turn. So you begin to dart forward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is just my movement. 120 feet or until I'm on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your movement is not 120 feet. You're still flying through there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay. So yeah, you begin to come in, you see him just begin to come into your visual range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still away from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to use a bonus action to dash and hit his back, and land on his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You land on his back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Attack, attack. First attack is a-- scheisse. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on them automatically, which means you don't have disadvantage on these strikes, but you do not get the automatic sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember-- oh, I don't get the automatic sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I got advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Essentially, you would have advantage, and then trying to grip onto him and through the middle of this tunnel and slamming into him, you would have disadvantage, and so they both cancel to just a regular attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so 24 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one was a natural 20? All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, eight, 14, 19, plus Hunter's Mark. So there's no sneak attack on this, right, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 with the dragon-slayer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then Whisper, which is a natural 20, is one plus that is nine, plus the-- six is 15, plus Hunter's Mark. 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Times two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. 15 times two is 30.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all times two, 'cause that's all-- well, 15 times two is 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 plus eight. 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the dark. Alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a dark pit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear the voice of my mother in the morning. Fuck you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the blade plunges into Thordak's now-sloughing and soft flesh, exposed through a series of wounds and gashes left behind by your allies, and his form just slowly shriveling into its diminutive space, the dagger cuts cleanly through, and with that force you go all the way up to the shoulder as you reach inside. As you finish saying your phrase, your eyes narrow and you clench your teeth, and as you pull back and yank, there's this strange series of low whispers that come into your ears, and as you pull back, you watch as these bits of greyish energy begin to pour out of the air, coalescing around the blade, fitting into the body where you're currently plunged within. As you yank outward, you watch as the blade almost has an extended edge about ten, 15 feet beyond Whisper's actual-- and this blade edge just leaves a giant wound on the side of Thordak's body. You don't even hear an exclamation of pain as Thordak just slowly slams into the ground of this low, barely glowing tunnel. Roll an acrobatics check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with the speed and impact of tumbling, you manage to reduce the damage by half, so you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is also halved by the potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. That is 17 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that the quarter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even know it's happened, though, yet! It's all underground!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She would know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do know. Can I fly forward before we take the break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to fly forward and hug my brother as he's just covered in dragon guts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's way down in there. That's a long flight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now we'll take a break. So we'll be back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget, Backblaze is hosting a Critical Role giveaway. Anyone who signs up for a free trial with Backblaze at backblaze.com/criticalrole through January 8th will be eligible to win items signed by the Critical Role team that killed a dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll receive this awesome dice tray signed by us. Half of us at the break, and the other half will sign before the night is out. But it's coming your way real soon. Congratulations, DetectiveKane! Get this out of my fucking face!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody's there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somebody take it from me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know that guy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I see half a dozen people on their phones behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels so good to be able to do that, but it feels better when it's immediate. Otherwise, it feels, like, kinda good. All right, so. Picking up where we left off. The rest of you watch as Thordak swooped into the hole that he emerged from, quickly followed by Vex and Vax. There is still on the field-- Raishan just tore into this lizard man. We have a fire giant that is unscathed currently, bearing down on the rest of the party, and a wyvern rider back around this wall section here. That being the case, they end that turn there. First up is Lady Kima. Who is pissed that she hasn't had a chance to really do anything tonight against flying dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a big fire giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Paladins that don't fly and have haste have a hard time getting around. Just so you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vestige!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watching this giant whale upon Percy pisses her off, and she cracks her neck. "You're first." And she leaps down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open him up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is-- that hits. And the other also hits. Even with a minus five on each for her Great Weapon Master. She's also going to Divine Smite on that at a level three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First strike is a 14, plus ten, 24. Plus 11, 35. 42 points of damage on her first strike against the giant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is up now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, how's Pike doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike-- oh, Pike's turn! Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's doing great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Head out of ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry! Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's in Manhattan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She stands up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll do the giant's turn now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant, who has watched Percy get pulled away, steps in to get into melee range with both Kima and Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's such a mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is going to take a strike on each. Takes an attack on Kima and rolls-- that's a 20, that hits. And then roll Grog-- that is a 29.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 28 points of damage to Kima and-- it's fun to roll against the players. 33 points of slashing damage against you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So halved to, math?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I will use my Retaliation. The old chin turned back. Reckless. Great Weapon Master. That's better. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. 21, that was crap. And 22. Both ones. 22 plus ten is 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Pike. What's Pike doing now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Pike stands up. She's going to run forward and say, "You can't have all the fun, "Grog!" And she's going to Guiding Bolt, level four, at the fire giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage. All righty. Raishan just swoops into the darkness of the chamber beyond. Keyleth. You just manage to catch up at this point now, at a full run, this will be your full turn, catching up to Vex and Vax. Or Vax specifically, Vex is a little beyond, aggressive stance, Raishan nowhere to be seen, Thordak's corpse ground into the dirt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is she?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going after her? I mean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run deeper into the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Jarett and Gilmore, at this point, manage to catch up to you guys, as well. It'll take a while for Grog and Kima to catch up to you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I didn't say I was leaving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looting the giant's body?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's a lizardfolk right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true, actually, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to see how many licks it takes to get to the center of a Tootsie Roll Pop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. It takes one lick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Grog, it's staring at you, going like (growl).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach out and go like (head crushing sound).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18. 18 plus seven. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? There's this moment where you're grabbing its head, and it reaches up and (frantic snarl).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very Riki-oh type moment. The head just pops outward in a smear of purple gore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well. Anybody see that? Who's here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My hand is near you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima's there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ha, fuck Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over at Kima, and Kima's kind of spattered with it, and she goes, "Well done!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smooth, right? Let's join everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right." You're going your movement, about there, full speed. Kima's a little slower behind. She'll catch up at a full double-dash speed, there. Jarett and everybody else has kind of moved in. We'll say at this point, the rest of you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Jarett is just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can't do anything, he's having a bad day, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poor Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys all charge in after?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm doing the best I can, I can't see a damn thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys are far behind. So it's currently you three in the lead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should anybody stay out here in case she wants to come back out? You want me to stay out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, for the rest of the one minute it works for. Which is not very long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If she makes her way out, that means we're all dead. Come on in. It'll be fun. Let's all die together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll go to the spa afterwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys kind of rush into this chamber now, and the heat in here is more immense than anything you felt on the surface. This is kind of the core of the volcanic surge that Thordak's presence was pulling upward. You see within, there's this flow of lava. I want the three of you to roll perception checks, if you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's the three, Vax, Vex, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is at advantage because it's a dragon-related thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, are you looking for Raishan, or are you inspecting the room for details?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, what am I rolling for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was rolling to see just the general vicinity of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, the first thing you notice as you glance around, is there are some kind of alcoves inside this chamber where the rock formations pull inward. You see kind of set into the stone and various bits of fallen rock and earth, a handful, somewhat spread out throughout the room, a handful of large nine-foot-tall dark, deep crimson red with crystalline elements to the outside, ovoid structures. These are what appear to be larger than normal, elementally altered dragon eggs. Five of them in the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five bebes?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Muppet Babies...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look back at Thordak? What does it look like-- I know Raishan, like, (gasps) made him do that. Does it look like there's anything around him, or is he just dead-dead still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slamming into the ground around you, exploding in a massive explosions, rocking you. All you see is white, and ringing in your ears as your bodies are thrown from explosion to explosion. I need the three of you to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a natural 19, so 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, guys! That's really good rolling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is 20d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did we have to beat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to beat 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you take 63 points of fire damage. Halved, to 31. And then you each take 70 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 130-something total points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As these flaming arcane meteors crash into the ground, detonating and destroying a portion of the cavern floor, lava spatters everywhere, and you watch as you duck out of the way as, Keyleth, what are your hit points at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm actually still up at-- What's 101 minus 119? 18 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 11:22, guys! We gotta get home!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next year?! We have to wait a year?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to find out if I'm for sure dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got you, I got you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm across the fucking room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter, I can fly 500 feet, I got you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to get the conclusion of this before the next season of Westworld.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lay on Hands, dude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, shut up. I will kill you in the parking lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will pick this up in January.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that called, those four flaming rocks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's called Meteor Swarm. That's a 9th-level spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a spell? What level is that?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: 9th-level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She just blew her wad, she's done, we got a dragon and a flute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right. She has nothing else up her sleeve. So. On that note.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This could possibly be a whole different encounter, I don't want to keep you guys here until 1 AM. I know Laura has to record in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I have to film all day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an 8 AM session.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to take a few rounds for the rest of the party to get here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She didn't get to ask any of the questions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might not have even needed to ask questions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course she did, she cast a big spell to do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe she was doing it telepathically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about? She read a scroll!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was just taking his soul into herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Information!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regardless. (laugh) We are out for the evening, thank you all for sticking with us for this longer episode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should have just let her do what she wants, summon the most powerful thing in the universe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Team Rowdy Half-Elves, what's up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the half-elves are down here in this chamber, with the Thordak eggs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half-elves, running in, recklessly, yeah! Like we do!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got nothin'. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Anyway, guys. Thank you so much for watching, thank you guys for kicking ass in that battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talks Machina next week?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talks Machina on Tuesday. It's the Critmas episode, check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check out Backblaze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, indeed. And I guess have a wonderful New Year to all of you guys, very happy holidays to everyone. All viewers, Critters, Team Hooman, and everyone who decides to spend their Thursdays with us. We really appreciate it. Love you very much, and we'll see you in the new year. Is it 2017 yet? [music]
